__e: His job application says he has an ex-wife and a six-year old son.
I mean, what if I said that, in order to date me, we'd have to hang out with your ex-wife and her husband?
She's my ex-wife, and I have no idea what she's doing here.
No, I will not tell your son that your ex-wife is that word, nor will I tell your ex-wife that she is that word.
He wasn't ready and now that his ex-wife is in town...
Yeah, well, murdering your ex-wife will do that to you.
My ex-wife got custody of him years ago, but I still see him as often as I can, even if it is from a distance.
The wife got the kids, he got the house.
